title: Super Neptunia RPG: Deluxe Edition – v20190807 + 13 DLCs
body:
Super Neptunia RPG: Deluxe Edition – v20190807 + 13 DLCs


Genres/Tags: RPG, Side, 2D, Japanese
Companies: Compile Heart, Idea Factory, Artisan Game Studios, Idea Factory International
Languages: ENG/MULTI5
Original Size: 3.7 GB
Repack Size: from 1.8 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + 2 (Uploaded by Uria Urikra and hermietkreeft, compatible with torrent)
  • Filehoster: WorldSrc (NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Super.Neptunia.RPG.Deluxe.Edition-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-super.neptunia.rpg.deluxe.edition.iso (3,946,971,136 bytes)
  • 13 DLCs are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading of bonus content (OST, Wallpapers, ArtBook) and videos for languages you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 3.7 to 1.8~2.8 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 2-4 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 6 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

The self-proclaimed hero, Neptune, awakes in a familiar world, but has no recollection of anything other than her name. With the help of a mysterious girl named Chrome, as well as three other familiar faces beloved in the Neptunia™ series, Neptune embarks on a journey through the mysterious dimension to try to regain her memory.

Little do they know, the world they inhabit is under attack by an enemy who wants to take civilization back to the time where 2D reigns supreme.

Can Neptune and her friends save the world and 3D games as we know it, or will they be flattened into two dimensions forever?

Included DLCs

  • Deluxe Pack
  • Dengeki Bracelet Set
  • Dengeki Accessory Set
  • Famitsu Weapon Set
  • Enchanted Weapon Set
  • [Cosplay Series] Equipment Set
  • [Foreign Series] Equipment Set
  • [Traditional Series] Equipment Set
  • [Enchanted Series] Equipment Set
  • Additional Party Members Set
  • Animal Ears and Tails Set
  • Swimsuit Set
  • Sentai Set

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS HEAVILY backwards compatible with my initial game repack. The only changed files are fg-03.bin and setup.exe
